content:
Promo Summary/Background:
Cheryl is being considered for promotion due to her exceptional performance and contributions to the IT department. She has consistently demonstrated strong technical skills, the ability to effectively communicate and collaborate with both the team and customers, and has taken on additional responsibilities such as supporting local network needs and leading employee onboarding efforts.

Communication & Influence:
Cheryl has a proven track record of effectively communicating and resolving IT service issues and desktop support. She is able to clearly and professionally communicate with customers and team members to understand and resolve their IT issues. She has also shown ability to influence her team and customers through her communication skills and IT knowledge.

Innovation & Complexity:
Cheryl is known for her ability to think outside of the box and come up with innovative solutions to highly complex IT issues. She has a broad knowledge base and is able to leverage collaboration tools to exceed customer expectations. She has consistently demonstrated the ability to find solutions to complex problems that other team members were unable to solve.

Organizational Impact:
Cheryl has consistently demonstrated high organizational impact by working smart and hard to support the team and customers. She has taken over support of local network needs and frequently assists the network team to complete projects and troubleshoot issues. She has also taken on all employee onboarding preparation, readiness, and first-day employee training & setup to become the site's subject matter expert, ensuring that all new employees have a productive and elevated onboarding experience. While working on the Desktop Remote Support team earlier in 2022, she stayed on-site in a hybrid role to support the CSO team out of a sense of duty and sense of urgency to fill a critical support gap. Overall, she is known for her dedication, work ethic and for being a valuable asset to the organization.

Overall, this candidate has a proven track record of exceptional performance and has consistently demonstrated the skills and qualities required for a successful promotion. She is highly qualified and would be an asset to the organization in a higher role.
